title: IBM Cloud Pak for Data
introduction: With Cloud Pak for Data you can collect, organize, and analyze your data to generate insights with an extensible, end-to-end platform for governance, analytics, and AI.

links.title: Getting started with IBM Cloud Pak for Data
IBM Cloud Pak for Data documentation

section_highlights.title: Document text extraction API for improving RAG solutions
section_highlights.description: When processing documents in a retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) use case, you can now test a new document text extraction API in watsonx.ai on IBM Cloud.

section_highlights.title: Db2 and Db2 Warehouse on Cloud Pak for Data
section_highlights.description: With Db2 on Cloud Pak for Data, you can manage your data on a single platform, providing you with enhanced flexibility to modernize your apps, powerful analytics capabilities, and the security of keeping it all in one place.

tiles.title: Release of Cloud Pak for Data 5.0.3
tiles.description: This release of Cloud Pak for Data is primarily focused on defect fixes. However, this release includes new features for services.

tiles.title: Release of Cloud Pak for Data 5.0.2
